extendedInfo.description: Singapore's best MRT and LRT map! Up-to-date with all the metro lines for 2012; Works offline; Routeplanner, GPS, Google Maps; English and Chinese included.WHY EXPLOREMETRO?1. Fully up-to-date for 2012Accurate metro map, includes every station on every line. Free updates for future station openings and timetable changes.2. Designed for AndroidSupports all devices running Android 2.2 or higher. Designed to use the latest Android technologies like the Action Bar, HDPI screens and global search.3. Google Maps for every station Need to get your bearings at a station? Integrated Google Maps show you metro exits and nearby streets for every station.4. Route-planner A really easy route-planner. Get route, time and price information for any journey with just three taps. 5. "Find my nearest station" Using your GPS, see a list of the closest metro stations to your current location. 6. Works offline Everything works without an Internet connection. Search stations and plan routes on the go.SUGGESTIONSWe'd love to hear your comments and suggestions on ways to improve the app. Please contact us via support@exploremetro.com, as we can't respond to comments left in the reviews.

reviews.title: Efficient.
reviews.comment: This app is user-friendly and clear in map resolution. Definitely one of the best metro apps out there. I find the train distance cost very handy, all it needs is to include a children/senior citizen fare.
reviews.author: GRAYREBORN NHY

reviews.title: Effective
reviews.comment: As a tourist I find this app invaluable. Such a simple yet effective interface. The estimated times and costs are also spot on. A must have in Singapore.
reviews.author: chris Findlay

reviews.title: samsung galaxy s2
reviews.comment: great app, it\'s just about need to add zooming (out&in) capability.. the rest is great.. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Kudos to the developer for listening to the feedback and removing the extra permissions previously added.\tLatest version allows the app to read my phone number and serial number. Why do they want/need this?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best MRT app, period
reviews.comment: If you need the fastest way of getting from one station to another, use this app. It calculates the train traveling time for you and presents the different options you have.   For example, Serangoon to Bukit Batok, Circle > EW Buona > NS Batok takes 32 min, as compared to NE > EW Outram > NS Batok taking 38 minutes.  Timings between each stations are also clearly stated. First and Last Trains too. Awesome!!   It even works offline!
reviews.author: Joshua Lim

reviews.title: Simple, Yet Effective.
reviews.comment: Good job. Can add more details about the area etc. (:
reviews.author: HelloEverybody Lim

reviews.title: Effective and Reliable
reviews.comment: This application have accurate timing and good quality. I love how this application have it\'s own integrated map, allowing us to plan our own route. \342\231\241\342\231\241   This is a must have application for everyone who rides the mrt.   The only reason why I\'m not giving 5 stars is because of the fares in the application only reflect adult fares. Developer, I would appreciate it so much if you can include concession fares for students and senior citizens. ^-^ the rest of it is awesome.
reviews.author: Emily Lim

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Easy to find stations on route and plan from one station to another
reviews.author: AMIT JADHAV

reviews.title: Ok app. But now full of spam!
reviews.comment: Stupid app now days. Too much spam and commercials. Avoid this app now. Uninstalling. Google maps can find same things and no spam there.
reviews.author: Juha-Matti Saari

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Comprehensive network map with (presumably accurate) timings for all lines from each station. An offline street map is also included for every station too. Simple interface,  although information for a station appears only if you search,  not by clicking on it. Perhaps some room for improvement? The online advert is a little intrusive, but understandable in a free app. Would be nice if the series was extended to include western cities.
reviews.author: Anoni Mouse

reviews.title: Super!!
reviews.comment: This app shows all you need for train guides. .u work island wide and this app helps alot! It shows best routes, time of travel, and even the fare!!
reviews.author: Dondee Maghanoy

reviews.title: Visually attractive
reviews.comment: I would like to see alternative routes when planning a journey however. Also, the estimated timing is different from another app, not sure if this app is correct.
reviews.author: Darrell Tan

reviews.title: annoying ads
reviews.comment: ads pop up and obscure the whole screen while i was planning my route. ads should occupy a small space and be minimally intrusive to avoid ruining the user experience
reviews.author: Tan Jun Jie

reviews.title: Ads Irritating, Could Be Better
reviews.comment: Full-screen ads become irritating after a while. Simple to use and useful, but an occasional visitor to Singapore like me does not find it worthwhile to get an EZ-Link card, so it would be more useful if the cash fare for a route could be displayed as well.
reviews.author: Dennis Lee

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: It is simple and straightforward. But needs some updates since more LRT stations are open.
reviews.author: Weihong Huang

reviews.title: A Helpful companion
reviews.comment: This app really smoothens my first trip to Singapore. Easy to use; contains every necessary informations; fast loading speed; integrated with GPS and google map.  Cons: 13Mb is too much for the size of this app
reviews.author: Kevin Tanumihardja
